---
title: "Update extracted samples"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_notebook: default
params: 
  type: "extraction"
  id: "extraction_id"
  db: "Laboratory"
  
---

Access database.
```{r workspace, echo = F, message=FALSE}
source("../genomics/scripts/lab_helpers.R")
write <- write_db(params$db)
library(knitr)
```
Find the range of rows to be changed
```{r change}
# pull in all table
dat <- dbReadTable(write, params$type)

change <- dat %>% 
  filter(extraction_id >= "E4647", 
         extraction_id <= "E5126") %>% 
  mutate(date = "2018-07-16")


dat <- change_rows(dat, change, params$id)
```
Write to database
```{r write}
# dbWriteTable(write, params$type, dat, row.names = F, overwrite = T)
# dbDisconnect(write)
```
